title: Pset_DiscreteAccessoryColumnShoe
description: Shape properties common to column shoes.

ColumnShoeBasePlateThickness.title: ColumnShoeBasePlateThickness
ColumnShoeBasePlateThickness.description: The thickness of the column shoe base plate.

ColumnShoeBasePlateWidth.title: ColumnShoeBasePlateWidth
ColumnShoeBasePlateWidth.description: The width of the column shoe base plate.

ColumnShoeBasePlateDepth.title: ColumnShoeBasePlateDepth
ColumnShoeBasePlateDepth.description: The depth of the column shoe base plate.

ColumnShoeCasingHeight.title: ColumnShoeCasingHeight
ColumnShoeCasingHeight.description: The height of the column shoe casing.

ColumnShoeCasingWidth.title: ColumnShoeCasingWidth
ColumnShoeCasingWidth.description: The width of the column shoe casing.

ColumnShoeCasingDepth.title: ColumnShoeCasingDepth
ColumnShoeCasingDepth.description: The depth of the column shoe casing.
